overview: With a broadcast journalism background, KATIE REIACH made the transition into the world of Public Relations in the late 1990’s. Over the years Katie has been widely recognized for the design and implementation of the public relations approach that took junk removal service 1- 800- GOT- JUNK? from a place of sporadic media coverage to a level of unprecedented attention and growth. In her four years with the company Katie secured over 2, 000 news stories and was responsible for such high profile profile feature as: Rachel Ray, Dr. Phil, Extreme Makeover: Home Edition, The View, CBS Early Show, The Associated Press, Wall Street Journal, Inc. Magazine, CNN and Donny Deutsch. Katie also led her team to win the 2007 Stevie Award for Best Communications Team along with additional recognition as a top- ranking nominee for Best Company to Work For and Canada’s 50 Best Managed. Today Katie’s confidence, drive and targeted understanding of the needs of the media have made her a highly sought- after PR Specialist.
